Package org.rakiura.cpn.gui

Provides a GUI to draw, show, edit, simulate and so on coloured Petri nets.

Interface Summary
CPNAbstractFigure Represents an abstract figure for NetElements.
CPNAbstractNetFigure Figure representing a CPN Net.
CPNDecoration Represents a child figure which is a decoration for CPN figure.
NetListener Represents a net listener.
RowSelectionListener Represents a simple row selection notification used in tables and lists.

CPNPlaceFigure Represents graphically a CPN place.

SelectTransitionInSubNetDialog A Dialog Box to select a transition of a subnet that an arc can connect to.
SubnetArc Title: Fake Arc to shadow real arc in super net
SubnetPlace This is a fake Place to shadow a real place in a parent net.

Package org.rakiura.cpn.gui Description

Provides a GUI to draw, show, edit, simulate and so on coloured Petri nets.

The main class is NetToolboxApplication.java, which has a main method to start the Toolbox application.

The drawings are based upon the org.rakiura.draw package.

Every net can have multiple layouts. Each layout can only be used for the net it was created for, and only if the net has not changed.
You can load a net, a netdrawing or a layout. The missing elements will be regenerated.
